column6: Paint on keel mostly missing. Will polish prop and replace second shaft anode on next visit. One shaft anode missing.
Anode change next visit. Increase in barnacle growth throughout.
1 1/8” shaft anodes (2x) to be replaced next service. Paint looks great!
Installed 2 x 1-1/8” heavy streamlined shaft anodes
Installed 1 x 1-1/8” heavy streamlined shaft anode. Heavy barnacle growth occurring on bottom of keel.
Increasing embedded growth throughout port side paint. Installed heavy duty shaft anode.
Installed 2x heavy duty anodes. The strange anode behavior of eroding from the inside out continues. No recommended solution at this time.
Both anodes completely absent. Installed a shaft collar this time.
Shaft collar anode was loose, retightened.
